experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Led the team for the gamified learning platform ‘Level-up,’ managing the development roadmap and driving feature activation.- Launched challenges, daily streaks product to improve learning experience through gamification elements.- Created learner Achievements & badges feature to collect daily coins and build a sense of recognisation and small wins for learners
experience.description_html: Led the team for the gamified learning platform ‘Level-up,’ managing the development roadmap and driving feature activation.- Launched challenges, daily streaks product to improve learning experience through gamification elements.- Created learner Achievements & badges feature to collect daily coins and build a sense of recognisation and small wins for learners <!---->

experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: Building the world's greatest learning experience. Joined an early team of just 15+ people. Worked on:- Optimizing sales pages to boost user acquisitions & run experiments for better conversions- On platform Notification system to provide nudges to learners- Video Player optimization for the better asynchronous learning experience - Referral initiatives from 18% MoM to ~30% MoM- Established optimized process for project submissions, Evaluations & results declaration for learners with a completion rate ~20% higher than industry average.- Optimized internal systems to duplicate, import, delete, edit & operate content with better UX resulting in saving time & high-end operational efforts for internal teams.- Building & managing learners' portfolio products: Here learner's learning journey will be presented visually in the form of a portfolio, learners can also add/edit projects, demos, experiences, education, videos, articles, etc...  & present them to our recruiters.(For all my features, I set up analytics & instrumentation and build Mixpanel dashboards to make data driven decisions & to improve user experiences)
experience.description_html: Building the world's greatest learning experience. Joined an early team of just 15+ people. Worked on:- Optimizing sales pages to boost user acquisitions & run experiments for better conversions- On platform Notification system to provide nudges to learners- Video Player optimization for the better asynchronous learning experience - Referral initiatives from 18% MoM to ~30% MoM- Established optimized process for project submissions, Evaluations & results declaration for learners with a completion rate ~20% higher than industry average.- Optimized internal systems to duplicate, import, delete, edit & operate content with better UX resulting in saving time & high-end operational efforts for internal teams.- Building & managing learners' portfolio products: Here learner's learning journey will be presented visually in the form of a portfolio, learners can also add/edit projects, demos, experiences, education, videos, articles, etc... & present them to our recruiters.(For all my features, I set up analytics & instrumentation and build Mixpanel dashboards to make data driven decisions & to improve user experiences)

experience.title: Product
experience.description: Co-founded Feazy, Which is an order-ahead app, from which we helped restaurants go contactless with Digital Menus & helped them monetize their web presence with the Online Ordering feature and Conducted market survey, talked to more than 400+ restaurants understood their pain points, build a web platform for restaurants from where they can manage online ordering, offline ordering, daily/weekly basis sales analytics & payout management in the same platform.
